Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Florida's Final Spark
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Delve into some quirky and surprising facts about the Sunshine State, from its infamous electric chair to the antics of Donald Duck. Prepare for a jolt of trivia!

questions.text: What is the nickname of Florida's controversial death row electric chair?
questions.hint: The nickname suggests electricity and a sense of finality.

questions.text: What are the names of Donald Duck's three nephews?
questions.hint: Their names are rhyming and often listed together in Disney cartoons.

questions.text: What's the popular name of the breakfast meal consisting of sausages wrapped in pancakes?
questions.hint: The name evokes a cozy image of small animals tucked into something soft.

Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Brand Name Brain Teasers
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Test your knowledge of iconic brands and familiar faces. From credit card colors to talking toys, this quiz will challenge your pop culture recall.

questions.text: What colors are the two circles in the MasterCard logo?
questions.hint: These colors are bold and commonly seen in financial branding.

questions.text: Which of these toys answers questions?
questions.hint: This toy is a black sphere that provides cryptic responses when shaken.

questions.text: What color is Pepto-Bismol liquid?
questions.hint: This stomach remedy’s color is bright and easily recognizable in its bottle.

Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Landmark Lore
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Explore the fascinating details behind some of America's most recognizable landmarks and symbols. From record speeds to Uncle Sam's beard, get ready for a historical head-scratcher.

questions.text: What is the normal playback speed of a 12" long-playing record?
questions.hint: This speed is slower than a 45 rpm single but common for vinyl albums.

questions.text: What color is Uncle Sam's goatee?
questions.hint: This color matches the typical depiction of an elderly, patriotic figure.

questions.text: How many spikes are on the Statue of Liberty's crown?
questions.hint: The number of spikes symbolizes the seven continents or seas.

questions.text: An airplane's black box is usually what color?
questions.hint: This color makes the box easier to locate in crash investigations.

questions.text: How much does Peanuts character Lucy charge for her psychiatric advice?
questions.hint: Her fee is a small coin, affordable even for a comic strip character.

Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Scent-sational Smells
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Discover surprising facts about the world around us, from the most recognizable smell to the cost of a little advice. This quiz is a true sensory experience!

questions.text: According to a Yale University study, what smell is the most recognizable to American adults?
questions.hint: This aroma is often associated with mornings and a popular beverage.
